Sample Credit Card Numbers

Card Type 		Sample Number
VISA 			4111 1111 1111 1111
MasterCard 		5500 0000 0000 0004
American Express 		3400 0000 0000 009
Diner's Club / Carte Blanche 	3000 0000 0000 04
Discover 			6011 0000 0000 0004
enRoute 			2014 0000 0000 009
JCB 			3088 0000 0000 0009


Major Credit Card Prefixes and Lengths

Card Type 		Prefix 		Length
MasterCard 		51-55 		16
VISA 			4 		13, 16
American Express (AMEX) 	34, 37 		15
Diners Club/Carte Blanche 	300-305, 36, 38 	14
enRoute 			2014, 2149 	15
Discover 			6011 		16
JCB 			3 		16
JCB 			2131, 1800 	15


Sample Credit Card Numbers
The following are sample credit card numbers you can use for testing:

Card Type	Card Number
MasterCard	5105 1051 0510 5100
	5111 1111 1111 1118
	5454 5454 5454 5454
	5500 0000 0000 0004
	5555 5555 5555 1111
	5555 5555 5555 4444
VISA	4111 1111 1111 1111
	4007000000027
	4222 2222 22222
	4012 8888 8888 1881
American Express	3782 8224 6310 005
	3111 1111 1111 1117
	3434 3434 3434 343
	3700 0000 0000 002
	3400 0000 0000 009
	3714 4963 5398 431
	3787 3449 3671 000
Diner's Club	3852 0000 0232 37
	3000 0000 0000 04
	3056 9309 0259 04
Discover	6011 1111 1111 1117
	6011 0000 0000 0004
	6011 0009 9013 9424
	6011 6011 6011 6611
	6111 1111 1111 1116
JCB	3530 1113 3330 0000
	3088 0000 0000 0009
	3566 0020 2036 0505
